title: Too many champions for too few rune pages
body:
Why is there a limit to how many rune pages you can have? personally i'd like to have one rune page minimum per champ, cuz i LOVE customizing stuff, but i can't do that with only 25 rune pages, nor can i make many different builds for multiple champs because that means it'll take up rune page spots from other champions, which is annoying, and it forces me to limit myself in things i try unless i delete potential rune pages i'd rather keep...

Honestly think a better system for managing rune pages would be something similar to how item sets layout is set up, where u can specify what champion you want it to be for etc. etc.

replies.body:
I've heard of the item sets layout idea thrown around by other players, but being able to have 130+ pages might be a little overwhelming to most players.

Even if you don't have a page for every single champ, there's still the option to edit rune pages during champion select. My suggestion is to start off with something similar to the preset rune pages so then it's easier to go in an edit them and customize to exactly what you want for that champion and match. Obviously you don't have to make them exactly like the preset rune pages, but pages you're comfortable with and can use for a large group of champs you play.

If that's still not enough space, preseason is a good time to test out these sort of things. You can also share this suggestion with our devs, the[ gameplay board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) would be a great place for them to get awareness.

TBH, I don't really find myself playing all the champions, at most I'm usually playing around maybe 30 champions, but hopefully I provided some help and maybe some ideas on how to organize your rune pages to get the most out of them. :)

Yea i know about editing them, i do that if there is something i feel needs change depending on performance, compatibility with champs, who i meet and so on.

Also i usually have both champion specific pages and also pages designed to work with a wide range of champions, but it takes away space i'd use on other stuff unless i change an already existing page i'd rather keep, which means i can't personalize champions with more interesting builds.

But as u say, i get it that it could get a bit overwhelming for some people, but u could still keep it so u have to buy it, i already have all champions and basicly got nothing to use my blue essence on most of the time without when new champs get out, and i would happily spend most if not all my blue essence on rune pages if i'm able to increase the amount of pages i can have.

Anywayz, thanks for answering, ill share it on gameplay board aswell i think
